library(tidyverse)

# Problem 1

## Function for Randomly Drawing Birthdays

```{r}
rand_bdays = function(samp_size) {
  bday_vec <- runif(samp_size, min = 1, max = 365)
  
  if (samp_size == n_distinct(bday_vec)) {
    return(TRUE)
  } else {
    return(FALSE)
  }
  
}

```
